episodeTitle: Ordeal of Swamp! Chopper vs Priest Gedatsu!!
description: Chopper faces the priest Gedatsu in the Ordeal of Swamp. Meanwhile, Robin explores the ancient ruins and discovers the name of the lost city is Shandora.

events.title: Chopper vs Gedatsu Battle Begins
events.description: Chopper confronts Gedatsu, one of Enel's priests, in the Ordeal of Swamp. Gedatsu introduces himself and his powers, though he struggles with basic communication and frequently forgets to speak out loud.
events.significance: This marks Chopper's first solo battle against a major enemy in the Skypiea arc, testing his abilities and proving his worth as a Straw Hat pirate.

quotes.text: I am Gedatsu, and this is my Ordeal of Swamp!
quotes.speaker: Gedatsu
quotes.context: Gedatsu introduces himself, though he initially forgets to speak aloud

events.title: Gedatsu's Swamp Cloud Burger Technique
events.description: Gedatsu demonstrates his signature technique, Swamp Cloud Burger (Numagumo Burger), which creates a swamp cloud that traps victims. The more they struggle, the deeper they sink into the cloud.
events.significance: Introduces a unique fighting style based on the specialized clouds of Skypiea, showcasing the environmental differences of the sky islands.

events.title: Gedatsu's Jet Punch Revealed
events.description: Gedatsu activates Jet Dials installed in his elbows to deliver incredibly fast punches. The attack is so swift that even Chopper's Guard Point cannot fully defend against it.
events.significance: First display of Jet Dial technology in combat, demonstrating the advanced dial-based fighting techniques unique to Skypiea.

events.title: Gedatsu Uses Mantra (Observation Haki)
events.description: Gedatsu demonstrates his ability to use Mantra, the Skypiean term for Observation Haki, allowing him to predict Chopper's movements before they happen.
events.significance: Further establishes Mantra as a key power in Skypiea, continuing the arc's introduction of Haki to the series.

events.title: Chopper Uses Rumble Ball and Jumping Point
events.description: Chopper consumes a Rumble Ball and transforms into his Jumping Point form to evade Gedatsu's attacks with enhanced mobility.
events.significance: Showcases Chopper's strategic use of his Devil Fruit transformations and the Rumble Ball in combat.

events.title: Chopper Discovers Gedatsu's Weakness
events.description: Chopper realizes that Gedatsu's feet are his weak point and devises a strategy to exploit this vulnerability by climbing the ruins to reach them.
events.significance: Demonstrates Chopper's growth as a fighter, showing his ability to analyze opponents and adapt his tactics in battle.

events.title: Chopper's Arm Point: Kokutei Cross
events.description: Chopper transforms into Arm Point and delivers his Kokutei Cross (Obit Cross in the dub) attack, striking Gedatsu's weak point on his feet.
events.significance: Introduction of a new named technique in Chopper's arsenal, showing the expansion of his combat abilities.

quotes.speaker: Chopper
quotes.context: Chopper unleashes his attack in Arm Point form

events.title: Chopper Defeats Gedatsu
events.description: After being struck by Chopper's attack, Gedatsu attempts to escape using the Milky Dial on his other foot, but this accidentally propels him deep into the swamp cloud, defeating himself. Chopper celebrates his victory.
events.significance: Chopper achieves his first solo victory against a major enemy, proving his capabilities as a pirate. The comedic nature of Gedatsu's defeat highlights his incompetence despite his power.

quotes.text: I finally did it! I'm a real pirate now!
quotes.speaker: Chopper

events.title: Robin Discovers the Name Shandora
events.description: While exploring the ancient ruins, Nico Robin discovers a monument that reveals the name of the lost golden city: Shandora. She realizes the monument was erected after the city fell.
events.significance: Major revelation about the ancient city's identity, connecting to the larger mysteries of the Void Century and True History that Robin seeks to uncover.

quotes.text: This monument... it says the name of this ancient city is Shandora.
quotes.speaker: Robin
quotes.context: Robin deciphers the ancient text on the monument

events.title: Robin Seeks Clues to the True History
events.description: Robin continues taking notes on Shandora's ruins, expressing hope that she might find clues to the True History that she couldn't find in the Blue Sea below.
events.significance: Reinforces Robin's core motivation and hints at the importance of Skypiea's ruins to the overall mystery of the One Piece world and the Void Century.

quotes.text: I may find some clue to the True History here that I couldn't find on the sea below.
quotes.speaker: Robin

events.title: Yama Confronts Robin
events.description: As Robin is observing and taking notes in the ruins, the large Shandia warrior Yama appears before her, setting up a confrontation.
events.significance: Introduces a new threat to Robin and sets up conflict between the Straw Hats and the Shandia warriors.

events.title: Aisa Hears Defeated Voice with Mantra
events.description: Aisa, aboard a dial boat, uses her Mantra ability to hear Gedatsu's voice after his defeat. Her boat then stops working and she is attacked by a Sky Shark before being rescued by Conis and Pagaya.
events.significance: Shows Aisa's advanced Mantra abilities and continues the parallel storylines of various characters navigating Upper Yard.

quotes.text: I am Gedatsu, and this is my Ordeal of Swamp!
quotes.speaker: Gedatsu
quotes.context: Gedatsu introduces himself at the start of battle

quotes.speaker: Chopper
quotes.context: Chopper's attack in Arm Point form

quotes.text: I finally did it! I'm a real pirate now!
quotes.speaker: Chopper
quotes.context: Chopper celebrates his first solo victory

quotes.text: This monument... it says the name of this ancient city is Shandora.
quotes.speaker: Robin

quotes.text: I may find some clue to the True History here that I couldn't find on the sea below.
quotes.speaker: Robin
quotes.context: Robin's motivation for exploring the ruins

themes.description: Chopper's solo battle against Gedatsu represents his coming-of-age as a pirate, proving he can hold his own without relying on the stronger crew members.
themes.symbolism: Chopper's victory symbolizes his transition from the crew's youngest member to a capable fighter in his own right.

themes.description: Robin's exploration of Shandora's ruins and her search for the True History parallels the crew's larger journey to uncover the mysteries of the world.
themes.symbolism: The ancient ruins represent lost knowledge and hidden truths that Robin dedicates her life to uncovering.
culturalReferences: References to real-world archaeological exploration and the mystery of lost civilizations like El Dorado

themes.description: Despite Gedatsu's formidable powers and position as a priest, his extreme absent-mindedness and incompetence provide comic relief while still maintaining threat level.
themes.symbolism: Demonstrates that power alone doesn't guarantee victory - intelligence and awareness are equally important.

characterSpotlights.development: Chopper proves himself as a capable fighter by defeating a priest on his own, gaining confidence in his abilities and his place as a Straw Hat pirate.
keyActions: Consumes Rumble Ball and uses Jumping Point
Climbs ruins to reach weak point
quotes: I finally did it! I'm a real pirate now!

characterSpotlights.development: Robin uncovers crucial information about Shandora's history, advancing her personal quest to understand the True History and the Void Century.
keyActions: Discovers the city's name is Shandora
Takes detailed notes on the ruins
Reflects on finding clues to True History
quotes: This monument... it says the name of this ancient city is Shandora.
I may find some clue to the True History here that I couldn't find on the sea below.

characterSpotlights.development: Gedatsu is established as a powerful but deeply flawed opponent, with his incompetence ultimately leading to his own defeat despite his considerable abilities.
keyActions: Uses Jet Punch with Jet Dials
Accidentally defeats himself with Milky Dial
quotes: I am Gedatsu, and this is my Ordeal of Swamp!

mangaDifferences.difference: In the anime, Arm Point Chopper's feet are depicted as reindeer hooves, whereas in the manga they are shown as human feet.

trivia.fact: This episode marks Chopper's first major solo victory against a significant enemy without assistance from other Straw Hat crew members.
Gedatsu's character design and incompetent personality make him one of the most comedic antagonists in the Skypiea arc, despite being one of Enel's priests.
The name 'Shandora' is derived from the Sanskrit word 'Chandra,' meaning moon, which connects to the Shandia people's origins.
This episode adapts parts of chapters 261-263 from the manga, showcasing parallel storylines of Chopper's battle and Robin's exploration.
Gedatsu would later fall from Skypiea to the Blue Sea and appear in a cover story where he opens a hot spring resort.
